elements.MAIN_EFFECT: []If I have 1 or more boosts: The {V}, {M}, and {O} of Characters you control other than me are equal to their highest statistic.  {J} []Target Character other than me gains 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: When I leave the Expedition zone — If you control one or more Landmarks: Draw a card.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} You may discard a Character from your Reserve. If you do: [Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: []If I have 1 or more boosts: The {V}, {M}, and {O} of Characters you control other than me are equal to their highest statistic.  At Dusk — If you control one or more Landmarks: Draw a card.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: When my Expedition moves forward — []Each Character controlled by target player gains [[Fleeting]].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} Roll a die. On a 4+: You may exhaust target card in Reserve.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: You may exhaust target card in Reserve.  {R} [][Sabotage].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} Roll a die. On a 4+: I gain 2 boosts.  At Dusk — If you control one or more Landmarks: You may return a card other than me from your Reserve to your hand.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: The next card you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: []If I have 1 or more boosts: The {V}, {M}, and {O} of Characters you control other than me are equal to their highest statistic.  When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []Target Character in play or in Reserve gains 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: []If I have 1 or more boosts: The {V}, {M}, and {O} of Characters you control other than me are equal to their highest statistic.  {R} You may pay {1}. If you do: You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Target Character in play or in Reserve gains 2 boosts.  {R} Roll a die. On a 4+: Distribute 3 boosts among any Characters in Reserve.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If you have two or more cards in Reserve: The next card you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If you control one or more Landmarks: Up to one target Character gains [[Asleep]]. You may give it 2 boosts.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} If you control a [[Fleeting]] Character: [Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} If you have two or more cards in Reserve: I gain 2 boosts.  When my Expedition moves forward — Roll a die. On a 4+: You may discard target Permanent with Hand Cost {3} or less.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.
